bibl.title: A Provisional Conclusion to the Horoscopic Ostraca from Medînet Mâdi.
bibl.note: Further annotated, dated horoscopes: O. Medinet Madi Inv. 1331 (post 187 A.D.). Three Greek notes, birth note and annotated horoscope; - Inv. 842 (post 195 A.D.). Annotated horoscope, date, and note; - Inv. 1208 (post 175 A.D.?). Birth note and annotated horoscope. - Annotated, undated horoscopes: Inv. 134 (post 187 A.D.?). Two annotated horoscopes and note; - Inv. CCLVI (post 131 A.D.?). Annotated horoscope; - Inv. 389 (post 142 A.D.?). Annotated planetary position; - Inv. 1154 (post 171 A.D.). Annotated horoscope [ed.: Richard A. Parker, A Horoscopic Text in Triplicate, Grammata Demotika. Festschrift für Erich Lüddeckens (Würzburg, 1984) pp. 141-143]; - Inv. 1060 (post 173 A.D.). Two annotated horoscopes [ed.: Richard A. Parker, A Horoscopic Text in Triplicate, Grammata Demotika. Festschrift für Erich Lüddeckens (Würzburg, 1984) pp. 141-143]; - Inv. 582 (post 145 A.D.?). Annotated horoscope and number. - Historical, astronomical and astrological implications: Summary; - Historical dating; - Astrological techniques; - Astronomical techniques.
bibl.seg: Micah Ross, A Provisional Conclusion to the Horoscopic Ostraca from Medînet Mâdi.

Further annotated, dated horoscopes: O. Medinet Madi Inv. 1331 (post 187 A.D.). Three Greek notes, birth note and annotated horoscope; - Inv. 842 (post 195 A.D.). Annotated horoscope [ed.: Richard A. Parker, A Horoscopic Text in Triplicate, Grammata Demotika. Festschrift für Erich Lüddeckens (Würzburg, 1984) pp. 141-143]; - Inv. 1060 (post 173 A.D.). Two annotated horoscopes [ed.: Richard A. Parker, A Horoscopic Text in Triplicate, Grammata Demotika. Festschrift für Erich Lüddeckens (Würzburg, 1984) pp. 141-143]; - Inv. 582 (post 145 A.D.?). Annotated horoscope and number. - Historical, astronomical and astrological implications: Summary; - Historical dating; - Astrological techniques; - Astronomical techniques.
